ai-iti17:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti17:2.1_0: “Taking into account exterior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very helpful as good friendship for a trainee mendicant who hasn’t achieved their heart’s desire, but lives aspiring to the supreme sanctuary.
ai-iti17:2.2_0: A mendicant who has good friends gives up the unskillful and develops the skillful.”
ai-iti17:2.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti17:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
